title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid credentials and appropriate role-based access is enforced.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Submit the login form
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard with modules accessible according to their roles

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username and/or password
Submit the login form
Verify login is rejected and error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: Dashboard Home Displays Correct Statistics
description: Verify the dashboard home page loads correctly and displays accurate key statistics and overview cards.

steps.description: Log in as a user with dashboard access
Navigate to dashboard home page
Verify dashboard shows correct summary data for needy individuals, donations, finance, volunteers, and recent activities

title: Needy Management - Add New Needy Person
description: Verify that a new needy person can be added successfully with validated input fields and relevant details, including bank accounts and documents.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to needy management module
Open 'Add Needy' modal/form
Enter valid details including personal info, bank accounts, and upload necessary documents and photos
Submit the form
Verify the new needy person appears in the list with correct data and details view

title: Needy Management - Input Validation on Add/Edit
description: Verify that form validations prevent submission of invalid or incomplete data for needy records.

steps.description: Navigate to add/edit needy form
Attempt to submit the form leaving required fields empty or entering invalid data formats
Verify appropriate validation errors are shown and submission is blocked

title: Needy Management - Update Existing Needy Record
description: Verify that existing needy records can be modified and saved successfully with updated information.

steps.description: Navigate to needy management and select an existing needy record
Edit fields such as contact info, bank accounts, or uploaded documents
Save changes
Verify changes are persisted and reflected in the details view and listing

title: Donations Management - Create Cash Donation
description: Verify that cash donations can be added with all necessary donor details, and receipts are generated.

steps.description: Navigate to donations module and select cash donations
Open new cash donation form
Fill in valid donor details and donation amount
Submit the donation
Verify the donation record is created and receipt is generated/available

title: Donations Management - Sacrifice Donation Workflow
description: Verify that sacrifice donations can be properly entered, tracked, and detailed records are accessible.

steps.description: Navigate to sacrifice donation section
Create a new sacrifice donation record with valid data
Submit the record
Verify donation is saved and details can be viewed properly

title: Finance Management - Add Bank Account and Transactions
description: Verify that users can create bank accounts and record transactions accurately with validations.

steps.description: Navigate to finance module and select bank accounts
Add a new bank account with required fields
Create a new transaction linked to the bank account
Submit the transaction form
Verify bank account and transaction are listed with accurate details

title: Finance Management - Generate Financial Reports
description: Verify the finance reports module generates accurate reports and allows exporting to Excel and PDF.

steps.description: Navigate to finance reports page
Select report parameters (date ranges, accounts, transaction types)
Run the report
Verify report data is accurate and consistent with entered transactions
Export the report in Excel and PDF formats
Verify exports are generated correctly with expected content

title: Event Management - Create and View Events with Calendar Integration
description: Verify users can create events successfully and the events appear correctly on the integrated calendar.

steps.description: Navigate to event management module
Open create event form and enter valid event details
Submit the event form
Verify the event is listed and appears in the calendar view on scheduled dates

title: Volunteer Management - Register Volunteer and Assign Mission
description: Verify that volunteers can be registered successfully and assigned to missions with all information saved.

steps.description: Navigate to volunteers module
Open volunteer registration form and complete all required info
Submit the form to create the volunteer record
Assign the volunteer to a mission
Verify volunteer is listed and mission assignment is reflected in details

title: Application Management - Aid Application Workflow
description: Verify application creation, status updates, and monitoring workflows function correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to applications management module
Create a new aid application with required data
Submit the application
Update the application status through various workflow steps
Verify the status changes are saved and visible in application tracking

title: Orphans Management - Add Orphan and Track Sponsorship
description: Verify orphan records can be created and sponsorship status tracked accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to orphans management module
Add a new orphan record with necessary details
Assign sponsorship details to the orphan
Verify orphan and sponsorship information is saved and displayed correctly

title: Aid Distribution - Add Cash and Service Aids
description: Verify that cash and service aids can be recorded and tracked with all relevant data.

steps.description: Navigate to aids management module
Create a new cash aid record with required fields
Create a new service aid record
Verify both cash and service aids are saved and listed correctly

title: Purchase Management - Create Purchase Order and Manage Merchants
description: Verify purchase orders can be created, linked to merchants, and modifications are saved properly.

steps.description: Navigate to purchase management module
Add new merchant details
Create purchase order linked with the merchant
Verify purchase order appears properly with merchant info and can be edited

title: Messaging System - Send Bulk SMS Message
description: Verify that bulk messaging can be composed and sent to selected recipients successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to bulk messaging page
Compose a valid SMS message
Select target recipients from available lists
Send the bulk message
Verify message is sent and delivery status is updated

title: Reports Module - Generate and Export Operations Reports
description: Verify reports generate accurate operational data and exports function as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to reporting module
Select operational report with filters
Generate the report
Verify report data accuracy and completeness
Export report to Excel and PDF
Verify exports match generated report data

title: User Settings - Manage User Accounts and Role Definitions
description: Verify administrators can create/edit user accounts, assign roles, and restrict access appropriately.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator
Navigate to user settings management page
Add a new user and assign a specific role
Edit existing user roles and permissions
Verify user has access only to permitted modules and actions as per role

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access modules or perform actions outside their role permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions
Attempt to access restricted modules or perform unauthorized actions
Verify access is denied and proper error or redirection occurs

title: Audit Logs - Capture and Review Critical User Actions
description: Verify that critical operations generate audit logs with accurate and complete information.

steps.description: Perform critical operations such as user role changes, donations entry, or finance transactions
Access audit logs from the system
Verify audit entries include user ID, timestamp, operation type, and affected data

title: Form Accessibility - Keyboard Navigation and Screen Reader Support
description: Verify that forms and tables support proper keyboard navigation and are accessible to screen readers.

steps.description: Navigate to various data entry forms and tables
Navigate entirely using keyboard (tab, shift+tab, enter, arrow keys)
Verify focus order is logical and all elements are accessible
Verify form elements have appropriate labels and ARIA attributes for screen readers

title: Performance - Verify Response Times Under Load
description: Ensure the system maintains acceptable response times under concurrent user loads up to 500 users.

steps.description: Simulate 500 concurrent users accessing critical pages like dashboard, needy management, donations, and finance
Verify response times remain under 2 seconds for all critical interactions

title: Data Validation Using Zod Schemas
description: Verify all form inputs and data entries are validated using Zod schemas to reject invalid data submissions.

steps.description: Enter invalid or malformed data in forms like needy management, donations, finance, and volunteers
Verify client-side validation prevents invalid data submission and shows descriptive error messages
